cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CL, cs.CV. 

The paper discusses a method for optimizing the learning efficiency of neural networks, which falls under the broad category of machine learning. Specifically, the paper focuses on curriculum learning, which is a technique for training models by gradually increasing the complexity of the training data. This topic is relevant to several sub-fields of computer science, including machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), neural networks (cs.NE), natural language processing (cs.CL), and computer vision (cs.CV). Given that the paper focuses on optimizing the learning process for neural networks, cs.LG and cs.AI are the most likely sub-categories, followed by cs.NE, cs.CL, and cs.CV.
